content.question: The term “cultural diffusion” refers to the

choices.label: modification of Earth’s surface by human actions
integration of behavioral traits within a group
spread of an idea or innovation from its source
relationship between human cultures and their physical environment
assimilation of a minority culture into the host society

content.answer: spread of an idea or innovation from its source

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe spatial patterns, networks, and relationships.
